acceptedAnswer.text: Tortellini is healthy when served in moderation as part of a well-balanced meal. This spinach tortellini has all the food groups including greens!

@graph.name: What do you serve with tortellini?

acceptedAnswer.text: I like to sere it with fresh parmesan cheese and fresh basil as a garnish (and for flavor). Also, baking some no knead bread or homemade french bread to sop up the delicious sauce is a must as well. This spinach tortellini pairs well with a delicious salad - especially this burrata salad.
